name: Dungeon Runners (itch) (Sushii)
description:
NOTE: The game is still in development and has more features planned for the future. A feedback would be greatly appreciated :)

Dungeon Runner is a 2D puzzle game where you plan your moves wisely. Try to not get burned by the flamethrowers and do many rooms as you can!

    - Commands

  • When stopped, you can place a block with the mouse pointer and while moving you can place a block while dashing pressing the space bar.
  • Use WASD to dash up, right, down and left
  • Click ESC to open the menu
